players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Has anyone seen the detective investigate?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. I think Bob is the mafia."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia."
Diana: "Charlie, you know I'm the detective, yet you claim Bob is mafia. I found Charlie mafia, so your accusation is false. Bob, your question is suspicious. I think Bob is innocent."
You: "I suspect Charlie is mafia; vote for him."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Has anyone seen the detective investigate?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia."
You: "I didn't kill Alice. I think Bob is the mafia."
You: "Bob is the mafia."
Diana: "Charlie, you know I'm the detective, yet you claim Bob is mafia. I found Charlie mafia, so your accusation is false. Bob, your question is suspicious. I think Bob is innocent."
Bob: "I suspect Charlie is mafia; vote for him."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Has anyone seen the detective investigate?"
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. I think Bob is the mafia."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia."
You: "Charlie, you know I'm the detective, yet you claim Bob is mafia. I found Charlie mafia, so your accusation is false. Bob, your question is suspicious. I think Bob is innocent."
Bob: "I suspect Charlie is mafia; vote for him."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
